body_html:
Hi,

It used to work in version 1.0.0.

Please look in the attachment 'fail-to-load-tf-bug.zip':

In the 'Dockerfile':

  • comment the line installing tensorflow 1.1.0
  • uncomment the line installing tensorflow 1.0.0

The Readme.txt file for the docker command to build & run.

The 'docker run' command works on 1.0.0 and fails on 1.1.0

Thanks for the help :)
Erez

body:
Hi,

It used to work in version 1.0.0.

Please look in the attachment 'fail-to-load-tf-bug.zip':

In the 'Dockerfile':
- comment the line installing tensorflow 1.1.0
- uncomment the line installing tensorflow 1.0.0

The Readme.txt file for the docker command to build & run.

The 'docker run' command works on 1.0.0 and fails on 1.1.0

Thanks for the help :)
Erez
